text: Ömer İzgi (born 1 January 1940) is a former Turkish politician and lawyer. He was the Speaker of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey from 2000 to 2002. He was a Member of Parliament for the electoral district of Konya between 1999 and 2002 from the Nationalist Movement Party (MHP). ==Other websites== *Collection of all relevant news items at Haberler.com Category:Living people Category:1940 births Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Turkey
title: Ömer İzgi
